scripts.fix:android: cd build && phonegap plugin rm cordova-android-support-gradle-release && phonegap plugin add cordova-android-support-gradle-release
scripts.platform:android: cd build && phonegap platform add android
scripts.platform:ios: cd build && phonegap platform add ios
scripts.prepare:android: cd build && phonegap plugin rm cordova-android-support-gradle-release && phonegap plugin rm cordova-android-play-services-gradle-release && phonegap prepare android && phonegap plugin add cordova-android-support-gradle-release && phonegap plugin add cordova-android-play-services-gradle-release
scripts.phonegap:build:android: cd build && phonegap remote build android
scripts.phonegap:build:ios: cd build && phonegap remote build ios
scripts.phonegap:start:android: cd build && phonegap remote run android
scripts.phonegap:start:ios: cd build && phonegap remote run ios
